PROJ-101.diff_excerpt:
@@ -1,5 +1,15 @@
+ @router.post('/login')
+ async def login(email: str, password: str):
+     user = auth_service.authenticate(email, password)
+     if not user:
+         raise HTTPException(status_code=401, detail='Invalid credentials')
+     return create_session(user)
